reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft, comfortable, and well-made, with a beautiful color that looks great with faux leather pants.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredibly soft!
items.body: This is a great oversized sweater. It‚Äôs nice and warm without being too chunky or thick. But the material is incredibly soft like a baby blanket. It‚Äôs cute enough to dress up paired with some jeans, or wear it with some leggings and be comfy lounging around the house. Super versatile and very comfortable. If you‚Äôre on the fence, give it a shot, I don‚Äôt think you‚Äôll dislike this one!!! Read more
items.author: ü•É

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and comfortable!
items.body: This sweater took a long time to arrive, but totally worth the wait! It‚Äôs sooo cute and very soft. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô10, 180, and ordered an X-Large. I could have bought a large and been fine, but the X-Large is roomy enough to layer underneath. The sleeves are long enough- a rarity for me! The length is perfect for leggings. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Jessie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, Stylish, and Perfectly Oversized!
items.body: I absolutely love this oversized turtleneck sweater! It‚Äôs exactly what I was looking for‚Äîwarm, stylish, and super comfortable. The chunky knit fabric feels soft and high-quality, and the slouchy fit gives it a trendy, effortless vibe. It‚Äôs perfect for layering in colder weather, and the oversized look pairs well with leggings, jeans, or faux leather pants. The turtleneck isn‚Äôt too tight or restrictive, making it extra cozy. Plus, I appreciate that it‚Äôs not itchy at all, which is a big win for me when it comes to knitwear! I ordered the grey color, and it looks just like the picture‚Äîneutral and versatile. I‚Äôll definitely be buying another in a different color! If you‚Äôre looking for a stylish yet cozy sweater to stay warm in the winter, I highly recommend this one! Read more
items.author: Lkndesign

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect except length
items.body: Oh my goodness I want to keep this so bad. Its not hot but feels thick, SUPER soft and beautifully made. It is the perfect cowl neck and seems make the perfect detail but im 5‚Äô5‚Äù and it comes mid thigh on me which is too long. Perfect otherwise!!! Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, cozy must have sweater
items.body: This sweater is a light weight, roomy and comfy. I sized up worried it wouldn't be long enough over leggings, but could have gotten my regular size of XS. Regardless, it's still perfect and doesn't look too big. Looks as advertised. When washed, it didn't shrink, the color is accurate, and the style is perfect for Fall or Winter, over jeans, leggings and with boots. It's a staple to have! Read more
items.author: Pbcarlie

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sizing inaccurate in gray
items.body: I bought this sweater in another color-same size but this gray sweater is NOT like the other sweater- it‚Äôs thicker and shaped different- not baggy and not that long. More like a small- no where near a large. Very disappointed with the quality of this sweater. Read more
items.author: NJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!
items.body: So warm and comfy. Perfect for leggings. Read more
items.author: Brittany

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars ute Sweater but Runs Big and a Bit Itchy
items.body: The sweater looks cute and the chunky knit is very trendy, but I found it a little bigger than expected ‚Äî definitely oversized even for a loose fit. The material is slightly scratchy on the neck, which makes it less comfortable for all-day wear. It‚Äôs warm and stylish, but not quite as soft or well-fitting as I hoped. Overall, it‚Äôs okay, but I wish the fabric was cozier and the sizing more accurate. I did end up returning this item. Read more
items.author: Kimberly Payne

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Brown, Blue, Army Green, Light Green, Black, Camel, Navy Blue, Brick Red, Dark Brown, Dark Green, Light Blue, Wine Red, Khaki, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
